price: «ከአላህ ሌላ (የምታጋሩዋቸው የት አሉ?)፤ ከኛ ተሰወሩ» «ከቶ ከዚህ በፊት ምንንም የምንገዛ አልነበርንም» ይላሉ፤ እንደዚሁ አላህ ከሓዲዎችን ያሳስታል፡፡
arabic: مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ قَالُواْ ضَلُّواْ عَنَّا بَل لَّمۡ نَكُن نَّدۡعُواْ مِن قَبۡلُ شَيۡـٔٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: min dūni al-lahi qālū ḍallū ʿannā bal lam nakun nadʿū min qablu shayan kadhālika yuḍillu al-lahu al-kāfirīna
